long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tetrem is a popup brick game that can save your pieces, change colour and controls, and remember the game state upon closing. Tetrem also includes a stats bar and score bar for analytics.

When you first get Tetrem the default controls are: Left arrow for moving left, Right arrow for moving right, Down arrow for soft drop, Shift for hard drop, Control for saving pieces, and Up arrow for rotate.
